attributes.action: Offer more then MINIMUM wage to Health Care Assistants!
attributes.additional_details: This subject is so close to my heart and I know there’s so many people who feel the same way as me, and maybe just maybe with the help of the world things could possibly change!
attributes.background: I’d like government to consider a pay rise for health care workers who have risked there lives during the COVID-19 pandemic just as much as NHS have but we’re still on minimum wage!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.  Pay for healthcare assistants depends on the role and experience - the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for setting the pay for these workers. 

You could start a petition calling for the Government to introduce a minimum starting salary for all healthcare assistants, setting out how much that should be, if that's something you'd like to see happen.
